Item: Supply and delivery of sanitizers and gloves
NT Unit price: Price not determined during this procurement as the RT contracts were not yet finalised by National Treasury
Method of Procurement: Quotations were sourced from 5 service providers on Central Supplier Database (CSD). Only 3 responded as the RT contract (National Treasury Transversal Contract) communication from NT was not issued. Lowest bidder was appointed.

Item: Supply and delivery of Surgical Masks
Method of Procurement: Quotations were sourced from the RT Contract list provided by National Treasury. No responses were received. The bid was re-advertised to 5 additional service providers from CSD. Only 3 service providers responded. Lowest bidder was appointed.

Item: Supply and delivery of Latex Gloves
Method of Procurement: Quotations were sourced from the RT Contract list provided by National Treasury. No responses were received. The bid was re-advertised to 5 additional service providers from CSD. Only 3 service providers responded. Lowest bidder was appointed

Item: Decontamination of Letaba and Hennops House
NT Unit price: Price not determined, list of service provider was provided by NT. Quantities are as per litres on the RT contracts whereas service providers wanted to quote as per square metres
Method of Procurement: Quotation were sourced from the RT Contract list provided by National Treasury. No responses were received. The bid was re-advertised to 5 service providers from CSD. Only 3 service providers responded. Lowest bidder was appointed
Quotations were sourced from CSD list and the lowest service provider was appointed.

Item: Supply and delivery of 3 layers face cloth masks
Method of Procurement: Quotation were sourced from the RT Contract list provided by National Treasury. Only 3 service providers responded. Lowest bidder was appointed.

Item: Decontamination of Letaba and Hennops office space
NT Unit price: Price not determined, list of service provider was provided by NT. Quantities are as per litres on the RT contracts whereas service providers wanted to quote as per square metres
